SUBJECT: offer for sale-stock exchange mechanism
DETAILS: standard life (mauritius holdings) 2006 limitedￂﾠ has submitted to the exchange, an announcement with respect to proposed offer for sale of the equity shares of face value of rs. 10 each (ￂﾓequity sharesￂﾔ) of hdfc life insurance company limited (formerly known as hdfc standard life insurance company limited) (the ￂﾓcompanyￂﾔ) by one of its promoters, standard life (mauritius holdings) 2006 limited (the ￂﾓsellerￂﾔ). the seller proposes to sell up to 36,000,000 equity shares (representing 1.78% of the total issued and paid-up equity share capital of the company) (ￂﾓsale sharesￂﾔ) on may 3, 2019 (ￂﾓt dayￂﾔ) (for non-retail investors only) and on may 6, 2019 (ￂﾓtￃﾷ1 dayￂﾔ) (for retail investors and for nonretail investors who choose to carry forward their un-allotted bids), through a separate, designated window of bse limited (ￂﾓbseￂﾔ) and national stock exchange of india limited (ￂﾓnseￂﾔ and together with bse, the ￂﾓstock exchangesￂﾔ).date and time of the opening of the offer for non-retail investors: may 03, 2019 9:15 a.m.date and time of the closing of the offer for non-retail investors: may 03, 2019ￂﾠat 3:30 p.m.ￂﾠdate and time of the opening of the offer for retail investors: may 06, 2019 at 9:15 a.m.date and time of the closing of the offer for retail investors:ￂﾠￂﾠmay 06, 2019 at 3:30 p.m.the sale shall continue to take place on a separate window of the stock exchanges on t +1 day, commencing at 9:15 a.m. and shall close at 3:30 p.m. (indian standard time) on the same date.the floor price for the offer shall be rs. 390 /- ( rupees three hundred only) per equity share ("floor price").

SUBJECT: offer for sale
DETAILS: standard life (mauritius holding) 2006 limited has informed the exchange regarding offer for sale of face value of rs. 10 each ("equity shares") of hdfc life insurance company limited (formerly known as hdfc standard life insurance company limited) (the "company") by one of its promoters, standard life (mauritius holdings) 2006 limited (the "seller") through the stock exchange mechanism intimated by way of notice on march 11, 2019.

SUBJECT: offer for sale-stock exchange mechanism
DETAILS: standard life (mauritius holdings) 2006 limited has submitted to the exchange, an announcement with respect to offer for sale through stock exchange mechanism for sale upto 70,000,000 (3.47%) equity shares of face value of rs. 10 each of the company ("base offer size"), with an option to additionally sell 29,500,000 (1.46%) equity shares of the company (the "oversubscription option" and in event the oversubscription option is exercised, the equity shares forming part of the base offer size and the oversubscription option will, collectively, hereinafter be referred to as ('offer shares').date and time of the opening of the offer for non-retail investors: march 12, 2019 9:15 a.m.date and time of the closing of the offer for non-retail investors: march 12, 2019 at 3:30 p.m.ￂﾠdate and time of the opening of the offer for retail investors: march 13, 2019 at 9:15 a.m.date and time of the closing of the offer for retail investors: march 13, 2019 at 3:30 p.m.the sale shall continue to take place on a separate window of the stock exchanges on t +1 day, commencing at 9:15 a.m. and shall close at 3:30 p.m. (indian standard time) on the same date.the floor price for the offer shall be rs. 357.50/- ( rupees three hundred and fifty seven and fifty paise only) per equity share ("floor price").
